bike.description: A-6 Quaternary phase alloy, custom butted, integrated head tube, curved top and down tube, CNC'D hollow box section BB, water bottle mount. Rear triangle: A-6 Quaternary phase alloy, custom butted w/ Four Bar linkage system 100m travel, Cold forged dropout with CNC'D disc mount and replaceable hanger, Sealed bearing pivots

components.description: Rock Shox Reba Team 32mm stanchions, Alloy steerer 100mm travel w/ Motion Control and PopLoc remote
Rock Shox Monarch 3.3 w/Motion Control and 3 position Switch Floodgate
Shimano XT Hollow Tech II w/Integrated spindle, 22/32/44T
Shimano XT Hydraulic Disc, 180/160mm Centerlock rotor
Ritchey Logic Zero Pro 1 1/8" Press Fit Integrated, 30mm spacers
Ritchey WCS Stream w/ Ca-NiTi rails
